quoteText: Service oparator informs that restricting the use of cookies may affect some of the functionalities available on the Website.
title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service
tosdr.tldr: The Cookie Policy states, "Service oparator [sic] informs that restricting the use of cookies may affect some of the functionalities available on the Website."
